about.title: Rotating 3D cube â„–1
about.more02: This project provides the user with the opportunity to interact interactively with a 3D model. In this case with a cube. The model can be zoomed in/out, stopped rotating, scrolled in your direction, etc.
about.more03: All this became possible thanks to the use of Three.js technology and Three.js Orbit controls.
about.name: Name
